title: Goat Cheese Ravioli
ingredients: ['285g goat cheese', '1 teaspoon extra-virgin olive oil', '5 tablespoons fresh, coarsely ground black pepper or to taste, lightly toasted', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '450g fresh pasta sheets', '125ml extra virgin olive oil', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '1/2 large onion, finely diced', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '1 large yellow heirloom tomato, peeled and chopped', '1 large red heirloom tomato, peeled and chopped', '125g fresh pineapple, chopped', '4 1/2 teaspoons herbes de Provence', '350ml passata', '1 clove garlic', '1 pinch salt', '5 fresh basil leaves, chopped', '20g wild rocket, coarsely chopped']
